scripts.gen:api: rimraf packages/sdk-api/src/server/generated && pnpm exec openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-nestjs-server -i openapi/openapi.yaml -o packages/sdk-api/src/server/generated --template-dir openapi/templates/nest-server --global-property=apis,models,supportingFiles --additional-properties=controllerSuffix=Controller
scripts.gen:sdk-browser: rimraf packages/sdk-api/src/browser/generated && pnpm exec openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-fetch -i openapi/openapi.yaml -o packages/sdk-api/src/browser/generated --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,withInterfaces=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,typescriptThreePlus=true,legacyDiscriminatorBehavior=false --global-property=apis,models,supportingFiles && node scripts/fix-generated-imports.mjs packages/sdk-api/src/browser/generated
scripts.gen:sdk-node: rimraf packages/sdk-api/src/node/generated && pnpm exec openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i openapi/openapi.yaml -o packages/sdk-api/src/node/generated --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,modelPackage=models,apiPackage=apis --global-property=apis,models,supportingFiles && node scripts/fix-generated-imports.mjs packages/sdk-api/src/node/generated
scripts.gen:sdks: pnpm run gen:api && pnpm run gen:sdk-browser && pnpm run gen:sdk-node
scripts.gen:all: pnpm run gen:sdks && pnpm run gen:types
scripts.contract:test: start-server-and-test "pnpm oas:mock:server" http-get://127.0.0.1:4010/health/live "CONTRACT_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4010 CONTRACT_MOCK_PORT=4010 pnpm --filter @qzd/sdk-node test:contract"
scripts.test:contract: start-server-and-test "pnpm oas:mock:server" http-get://127.0.0.1:4010/health/live "pnpm --filter @qzd/sdk-browser test:contract && CONTRACT_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4010 CONTRACT_MOCK_PORT=4010 pnpm --filter @qzd/sdk-node test:contract"
